title: The state of shaco
body:
shaco is a weak shit champ, e damage is little at all ranks 55 / 80 / 105 / 130 / 155 (+ 60 / 75 / 90 / 105 / 120% bonus AD) (+ 75% AP) making his early extremely weak, he gets bulldozed by other junglers, his q damage was removed, you cant even stack boxes, his r damage is little to none, his item synergies arent great, hes outclassed by rengar, khazix (in the jungle, talon, zed, every other assassin in general) this champion sucks and isnt getting buffed to a state thats fair and on par to any other assassin for no real reason. 

if riot would be interested in fixing the champ id suggest a total e damage revert, removing the damage nerf on clone, and re-introducing box stacking.

please riot just make my champion on par.

replies.body: i voted no cause i think it`s better to rework the champ cause u can`t do much with him.

for shaco mains, his kit is actually still very very fun, there is alot of skill expression that could be had if his base numbers were buffed. Right now however, he's being supressed by terrible base numbers that force him into possibly the most sink-or-swim playstyle of any assassin, since he lacks the base damages to make a comeback. He needs alot of thought and finetuning into finding an adequate solution, something that gives more counterplay, without gutting the utilities his identity is based around, and that will likely involve better counterplay around his stealth, such as a clown indicator when Shaco is stealthed within vision range for example. Giving opponents more counterplay options will give a bit more leeway to put more base damage back into his kit.

He's just about the only premeditated assassin left in league bar the infamous teemo and I really don't want to see that leave league.
The top Shaco players have no issue with him. This is a you issue.
His E  needs to actually do damage and his Q has to be instant like yi Q. Apart from that, he's actually pretty strong as an AP top currently imo.
